content: My teammate who's awesome at naming things asked why 'wai' vs 'wait' (WebAssembly Interface Types). Just checking it was considered. Wai is cool too. I don't have a stake in it either way :)

we did talk about that, but it seemed a bit too cute :smile: (Also, async will be built into it already, so there's no need for an async dialect, with its own file extension, named in the obvious way. That might have pushed me personally over the edge :grimacing:)
Bailey Hayes has marked this topic as resolved.
